about_the_game:
Enloyea: Chapter of the origin of alchemy is a horizontal RPG game, which has the following features:



1. The battle of both leisure and strategy

The fun of the game is to find the right strategy to achieve the goal of the level.

The easy and casual automatic battle helps players to clean up the monster's nest. Meanwhile, the battle of 255 levels in Chapter 14 of the main line depends on the player's operation level in the battle.



2. Unique lineup for each player

The player plays the leader of the camp and commands the brave to fight. Except for the rare brave with fixed image, the image and skills of ordinary brave are different.



3. 140000 original story

The story of the main line is integrated with the checkpoint, and the protagonist's love, hate and hatred are felt at the same time.



4. Freedom to explore the open world

Open world free exploration, hidden treasure map and material props around the world, waiting for players to discover.



Background:



It's a world of continents

Continental interlacing floating in space

It's said that there are 1000 stories in total, which is called "thousand story drifting continent"

In this world, creatures living on the upper continent are closer to God

The upper organisms are more powerful than the lower ones

On one of the floors is called aynloya

There are many countries, terrible slavery is all over the place, full of the domination and oppression of the gods

In the long history, alchemy was born

When it got to aynloya, they started to get stronger

These people are called heroes

Finally 10 years ago

By Alchemy, the talented alchemist, Nunn Jinyin, led the heroes to fight against the supreme ruler, King Charles

No one knows where he died in the end

Ten years later, in South Carolina, a small country in aynloa

A young girl left her hometown for the border of the Mainland
